name: Exocomets
description: Exocomets is a basic yet difficult action game where you try to survive as long as possible against incoming waves of comets. One hit, and your ship is dead. Survive for as long as possible by collecting powerups and stars to beat every level!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 15 MB available space
